installCommand: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9.15.4 --activate && corepack pnpm install --ignore-scripts && corepack pnpm --filter app prisma generate
buildCommand: echo BUILD_START && node -v && pnpm -v && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 pnpm build:webpack
